com.rift.coad.lib.deployment.jmxbean
Class JMXBeanManager

java.lang.Object
  com.rift.coad.lib.deployment.jmxbean.JMXBeanManager

public class JMXBeanManager
extends java.lang.Object

The JMX Bean manager is responsible for loading and unloading of jmx beans. It is controlled by the DeploymentManager.

Nested Class Summary
 class JMXBeanManager.BeanList
          This object maintains the beans in memory.
